about_the_game:
A set that includes a BGM Editor that can be used with ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV, as well as BGM from ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XII and ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIII (a total of 88 pieces). By using the BGM Editor, you can enjoy changing BGM within the game however you like.

▼Added BGM
- Pieces from ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XII: 35
- Pieces from ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIII: 53

▼How to use
By selecting "Editor" - "Edit BGM" from the start menu, you can edit BGM within the game, or initialize the settings.

Note: This product is included in the ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV Season Pass. Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase.
